author: FOX Sports
title: The Anthony Rizzo Foundation is providing meals to healthcare workers during the COVID-19 pandemic
description: Chicago Cubs first baseman Anthony Rizzo is providing meals for hospital workers in Chicago and Florida through his foundation.
content: With the NBA, NHL, NASCAR and other major sports leagues and sporting events suspended or canceled, professional athletes are using their platforms to facilitate financial support for arena workers and those affected by COVID-19 across the nation. Each day, w… [+3676 chars]
